title: True_me beauty
description: In this project, we crafted the brand identity for a women's skincare line with a focus on simplicity, elegance, and authenticity. Our designs sought to inspire women to embrace their true selves by creating visuals that echo natural beauty and intrinsic worth. From the logo to packaging, every element was thoughtfully designed to reflect these values, aiming to resonate deeply with the brand's target audience. The overall aesthetic aims to create an emotional connection, encouraging women to not just use the products, but to also engage in a journey of self-love and acceptance.‍
